subject: Re: [junit] Using JFC Unit, possible to access a window alread opened?
msgSnippet: ... If I read this correctly, you want to grab a handle to the JFrame, correct? Perhaps some code snippets would help here. Mike -- Mike Clark Clarkware
messageBody:
thenoodle1974 wrote:

> I can figure out how to grab a handle on a window I have opened. But
> I'd like to open that window then run the tests (Basically for
> debugging purposes as it takes about 3 minutes for the window to
> open...).
>
> It's a swing app. I just can't seem to snag the window.
>
> Any help would be appreciated!
>

If I read this correctly, you want to grab a handle to the JFrame, correct?

Perhaps some code snippets would help here.

Mike
